title: Radio & Music Services
description: We encapsulate Radio & Music business logic for iPlayer Radio and BBC Music products on all platforms. We add value by reliably providing the right blend of metadata needed by clients.

actions.title: listAvailability
actions.description: Discover details of on-demand availability for programmes and their versions

sort.description:
Sorts:
* scheduled_start: sort chronologically by scheduled start time/date, ascending

descendants_of.description: filter for subset of availabilities that have PID as ancestor

media_set.description: filter for subset of availabilities with media set

page.description: which page of results to return

page_size.description: number of results in each page

territory.description: filter for availabilities in given territory

actions.title: listBroadcasts
actions.description: Fetch metadata about linear Broadcasts and Services, allowing the generation of Television and Radio schedules and other datasets for broadcast items. Use /schedules instead of this feed as it is more efficient. Broadcasts will be deprecated in the future.

sort.description:
Sorts:
* start_date: sort chronologically by scheduled start time/date, ascending

mixin.description:
Mixins:
* titles: return ancestor programme titles

authority.description: filter for subset of broadcasts that have given authority

descendants_of.description: filter for subset of broadcasts that are descendants of the given programme PID

end_from.description: filter for subset of broadcasts that end on or later than the specified datetime

end_to.description: filter for subset of broadcasts that end on or earlier than the specified datetime

format.description: filter for subset of broadcasts that are classified in the given format ID

genre.description: filter for subset of broadcasts that are classified in the given genre ID

id.description: filter for subset of broadcasts that have given identifier

item.description: filter for subset of broadcasts with the given item performed on it

page.description: which page of results to return

page_size.description: number of results in each page

people.description: filter for subset of broadcasts that have given contributor

pid.description: filter for subset of broadcasts having given PID

q.description: filter for subset of broadcasts matching supplied keyword/phrase (boolean operators permitted)

schedule_day.description: filter for subset of broadcasts that start on the specified day (BBC time)

schedule_day_from.description: filter for subset of broadcasts that start on or after the specified day (BBC time)

schedule_day_to.description: filter for subset of broadcasts that start on or before the specified day (BBC time)

service_master_brand.description: filter for subset of broadcasts with given service master brand

sid.description: filter for subset of broadcasts that are on the specified linear service

start_from.description: filter for subset of broadcasts that start on or later than the specified datetime

start_to.description: filter for subset of broadcasts that start on or earlier than the specified datetime

version.description: filter for subset of broadcasts with given PID as their parent version

actions.title: listGroups
actions.description: Long-lived curated collections of programmes and more, including Collections, Seasons, Franchises and Galleries

sort.description:
Sorts:
* pid: sort alphabetically by PID

mixin.description:
Mixins:
* alternate_images: mixin to return the alternate images for a group
* group_for: mixin to return links to programme entities that group belongs to
* images: mixin to add image information for a group
* related_links: mixin to return related links for the group

for_descendants_of.description: filter for groups related to given programme or its descendants

for_programme.description: filter for subset of groups directly related to a given programme

group.description: filter for subset of groups which belong to the given group pid

group_type.description: filter for subset of groups that have the given group type

member.description: filter for subset of groups which contain an entity with the given pid as a member

page.description: which page of results to return

page_size.description: number of results in each page

partner_id.description: filter for groups by partner ID

partner_pid.description: filter for groups by partner PID

pid.description: filter for subset of seasons, collections, galleries or franchises having given PID

q.description: filter for subset of groups matching supplied keyword/phrase (boolean operators permitted)

actions.title: listImages
actions.description: Find metadata for images, particularly those in galleries

sort.description:
Sorts:
* group_position: sort numerically by position, ascending only
* pid: sort alphabetically by PID

group.description: filter for images belonging to the given group (i.e. Gallery)

is_alternate_image_for.description: filter for alternate images by entity PID

is_image_for.description: filter for images by entity PID

page.description: which page of results to return

page_size.description: number of results in each page

partner_id.description: filter for images by partner ID

partner_pid.description: filter for images by partner PID

pid.description: filter for subset of images having given PID

q.description: filter for subset of images matching supplied keyword/phrase (boolean operators permitted)

actions.title: listItems
actions.description: Look inside programmes to find segments: chapters, tracks and more

sort.description:
Sorts:
* pid: sort by pid, descending

mixin.description:
Mixins:
* contributions: mixin to return information about contributors to items
* images: mixin to add image information for an item
* offset: mixin to return programme segment offsets, works in conjunction with programme filter
* play_event: mixin to return programme segment events, works in conjunction with programme or segment_event filters

authority.description: filter for subset of items that have an ID issued by the given authority

id.description: filter for subset of items having given ID

id_type.description: filter for subset of items that have given an ID of the given type

item_type.description: filter for specific type(s) of items

page.description: which page of results to return

page_size.description: number of results in each page

partner_id.description: filter for items by partner ID

partner_pid.description: filter for items by partner PID

people.description: filter for subset of items that have specified person involved

pid.description: filter for subset of items matching one of the given PIDs

programme.description: filter for subset of items that are part of the given programme

q.description: filter for subset of items matching supplied keyword/phrase (boolean operators permitted)

segment_event.description: filter for item with the given segment_event

sort.description:
Sorts:
* mid: sort by mid, ascending

mixin.description:
Mixins:
* images: mixin to add image information for a masterbrand

mid.description: filter for subset of masterbrands that have given identifier

page.description: which page of results to return

page_size.description: number of results in each page

partner_id.description: filter for masterbrands by partner ID

partner_pid.description: filter for masterbrands by partner PID

q.description: filter for subset of masterbrands matching supplied keyword/phrase (boolean operators permitted)

actions.title: listPeople
actions.description: The People feed allows you to search for the people and groups that contribute to programmes. This is the starting point for cast and crew credits, as well as finding contributors using external IDs (such as Wikipedia URLs)

authority.description: filter for subset of people that have an ID issued by the given authority

has_external_id.description: filter for people who have an external identifier

id.description: filter for subset of people having given ID

id_type.description: filter for subset of people that have given an ID of the given type

page.description: which page of results to return

page_size.description: number of results in each page

partner_id.description: filter for people by partner ID

partner_pid.description: filter for people by partner PID

pid.description: filter for subset of people having given PID

programme.description: filter for subset of people that have contributed to the given programme pid

q.description: filter for subset of people matching supplied keyword/phrase (boolean operators permitted)

page.description: which page of results to return

page_size.description: number of results in each page

q.description: filter for subset of programmes matching supplied keyword/phrase (boolean operators permitted)

actions.title: listProgrammeDetails
actions.description: Exposes programme information for a single pid

page.description: which page of results to return

page_size.description: number of results in each page

partner_pid.description: Filter for programme information by partner PID

pid.description: Filter for programme information for the provided PID

actions.title: listProgrammes
actions.description: Fetch metadata about Programmes (brands, series, episodes, clips). By applying different filter restrictions this feed can be used in many ways, for example to retrieve all series belonging to a brand, all the episodes and/or clips for a specific series, or any TLEO objects for a masterbrand. Other filters permit restricting to specific formats and/or genres, and you can request specific versions (for example Signed or Audio-Described). Parameters may be combined in any way suitable for your application.

sort.description:
Sorts:
* group_position: sort numerically by position in group, ascending
* pid: sort alphabetically by PID, descending
* position: sort numerically by position, ascending
* promotion: sort by promotion rank, ascending
* release_date: sort chronologically by release date, descending
* relevance: sort by weighting of search term (use with q parameter)
* scheduled_start: sort chronologically by scheduled start time/date, ascending
* strict_title: sort alphabetically by title, ascending
* title: sort by title librarian style (ignoring leading 'The', 'A', etc), ascending
* tree: sort by root pid and then preorder tree sort. Requires entities to have release date.

mixin.description:
Mixins:
* alternate_images: mixin to return the alternate images for a programme
* ancestor_titles: mixin to return ancestor programme titles
* availability: mixin to return programme availability information
* available_simulcasts: mixin to return information about programmes that are currently available as simulcasts
* available_versions: mixin to return information about programmes that are currently available on demand
* available_webcasts: mixin to return information about programmes that are currently available as webcasts
* contributions: mixin to return information about contributors to a programme
* duration: mixin to return original version duration in programme concept entities
* genre_groupings: mixin to return list of genre groupings
* genre_groups: mixin to return list of genre groups
* images: mixin to add image information for a programme
* is_embeddable: mixin to add embeddable information for a programme
* previous_next: mixin to return the programmes which appear before and after a programme (as determined by the sort applied in the request)
* related_links: mixin to return information about related links to a programme
* titles: mixin to return ancestor programme titles
* versions_availability: mixin to return information about programmes that are currently available

audio_described.description: filter for subset of programmes that are audio-described

availability.description: filter for subset of programmes that have availability

availability_from.description: filter for subset of programmes that are available after or at the specified datetime

availability_type.description: filter for a subset of programmes that are available for a given type

children_of.description: filter for subset of programmes that have PID as immediate parent

descendants_of.description: filter for subset of programmes that have PID as ancestor

duration.description: filter for subset of programmes that have given duration

entity_type.description: filter for subset of programmes that have given entity type

format.description: filter for subset of programmes with format

genre.description: filter for subset of programmes with genre

group.description: filter for subset of programmes which belong to the given group pid

initial_letter.description: filter for subset of programmes with title beginning with initial letter librarian style (ignoring leading 'The', 'An' (Welsh), etc) 0-9 a-z

initial_letter_end.description: Programmes with (librarian) titles whose initial letter is equal/before given letter. Use with initial_letter_start for a range

initial_letter_start.description: Programmes with (librarian) titles whose initial letter is equal/after given letter. Use with initial_letter_end for range.

initial_letter_strict.description: filter for subset of programmes with title beginning with initial letter

item.description: filter for subset of programmes with linked to versions which have the given item pids

master_brand.description: filter for subset of programmes with master_brand

media_set.description: filter for subset of programmes with media set

media_type.description: filter for subset of programmes with media type

page.description: which page of results to return

page_size.description: number of results in each page

partner_id.description: filter for programmes by partner ID

partner_pid.description: filter for programmes by partner PID

payment_type.description: filter for a subset of programmes that are of the given payment_type

people.description: filter for subset of programmes with contributions by given people PID

pid.description: filter for subset of programmes having given PID

promoted_for.description: filter for subset of programmes which are promoted for given service

q.description: filter for subset of programmes matching supplied keyword/phrase (boolean operators permitted)

signed.description: filter for subset of programmes that are signed

tag_name.description: filter for subset of programmes with tag

tag_scheme.description: filter for subset of programmes with a tag

tleo.description: filter for subset of programmes that are TLEOs

version.description: filter for subset of programmes with given PID as one of their versions

actions.description: Details of short-term editorially curated "promotions", for instance those programmes featured on iPlayer today

actions.title: listServices
actions.description: The services feed exposes the linear broadcast "services" from PIPs. These are the actual services which broadcast programmes (eg bbc_one_oxford is the service for BBC One in Oxford).

end_from.description: Return services that end on or later than the specified datetime

end_to.description: filter for subset of broadcasts that end on or earlier than the specified datetime

mid.description: filter for services by masterbrand MID

page.description: which page of results to return

page_size.description: number of results in each page

partner_id.description: filter for services by partner ID

partner_pid.description: filter for services by partner PID

q.description: filter for subset of services matching supplied keyword/phrase (boolean operators permitted)

service_type.description: filter for specified type of linear services

start_from.description: Return services that start on or later than the specified datetime

start_to.description: Return services that start earlier than the specified datetime

actions.title: listVersions
actions.description: The versions feed exposes editorial "Versions" of programmes. These are concepts used to capture different presentations of an overall programme: for example, versions of a programme may include one with sign language, one with audio description, one edited for content and more. Versions are also important to understand for broadcasts: a linear broadcast or an ondemand is always of a specific version, not merely of a programme.

availability.description: filter for subset of versions that have availability

descendants_of.description: filter for subset of versions having given programme PID

media_set.description: filter for subset of versions with availability in the given media set

page.description: which page of results to return

page_size.description: number of results in each page

partner_id.description: filter for versions by partner ID

partner_pid.description: filter for versions by partner PID

payment_type.description: filter for a subset of versions that are of the given payment_type

pid.description: filter for subset of versions having given PID
